title: FinFlow SaaS Platform
subtitle: Enterprise Financial Management Solution
description: A comprehensive financial management platform serving 500+ enterprise clients with real-time analytics, automated reporting, and multi-currency support.
overview: FinFlow is an enterprise-grade financial management platform that helps CFOs and finance teams gain real-time visibility into their company's financial health. The platform processes over $2B in transactions monthly and serves clients across 40+ countries.
architecture: Microservices architecture with Next.js frontend, Node.js API gateway, and specialized services for transactions, reporting, and notifications. Uses PostgreSQL with read replicas for analytics and Redis for caching and real-time features.

challenges.title: Multi-Currency Transaction Processing
challenges.description: Implemented a robust currency conversion system with real-time exchange rates, handling complex scenarios like multi-leg transactions and historical rate lookups.

challenges.title: Real-Time Dashboard Performance
challenges.description: Optimized dashboard queries to handle millions of records with sub-second response times using materialized views and smart caching strategies.

results.description: Monthly transaction volume processed through the platform

title: Commerce Cloud Platform
subtitle: Headless E-Commerce Infrastructure
description: A headless e-commerce platform powering 200+ online stores with multi-tenant architecture, inventory management, and payment processing.
overview: Commerce Cloud is a headless e-commerce infrastructure that enables businesses to build custom storefronts while leveraging a powerful, scalable backend. The platform handles 50K+ concurrent users during peak sales events.
architecture: Event-driven microservices using Kafka for inter-service communication. MongoDB for flexible product catalogs, Elasticsearch for search, and Redis for session management and caching.

challenges.title: Black Friday Scale
challenges.description: Designed and implemented auto-scaling strategies to handle 10x normal traffic during peak sales events without service degradation.

challenges.title: Multi-Tenant Data Isolation
challenges.description: Built a secure multi-tenant architecture ensuring complete data isolation while maintaining efficient resource utilization.

results.description: Peak concurrent users handled during sales events

title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
subtitle: Business Intelligence Platform
description: A real-time analytics dashboard processing 10M+ events daily with interactive visualizations and custom reporting.
overview: A comprehensive business intelligence platform that transforms raw event data into actionable insights. Features real-time dashboards, custom report builders, and automated alerting.
architecture: Stream processing pipeline using Kafka for event ingestion, ClickHouse for analytics storage, and React with D3.js for interactive visualizations. Node.js API layer with GraphQL.

challenges.title: Real-Time Data Processing
challenges.description: Implemented a stream processing pipeline capable of handling 10M+ events daily with sub-second latency for dashboard updates.

challenges.title: Custom Visualization Engine
challenges.description: Built a flexible chart builder allowing users to create custom visualizations without coding knowledge.

title: Payment Gateway API
subtitle: Financial Infrastructure
description: A PCI-DSS compliant payment gateway processing $500M+ annually with support for multiple payment methods and currencies.
overview: A secure, scalable payment gateway that handles credit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets. Built with security-first architecture and comprehensive audit logging.
architecture: Distributed system with dedicated services for payment processing, fraud detection, and reconciliation. Uses PostgreSQL with encryption at rest and Redis for rate limiting.

challenges.title: PCI-DSS Compliance
challenges.description: Implemented comprehensive security measures including tokenization, encryption, and audit logging to achieve PCI-DSS Level 1 certification.

challenges.title: Multi-Provider Failover
challenges.description: Built intelligent routing system with automatic failover between payment providers ensuring 99.99% transaction success rate.

title: DevOps Automation Platform
subtitle: CI/CD Infrastructure
description: A comprehensive DevOps platform automating deployments across 50+ microservices with integrated monitoring and rollback capabilities.
overview: An internal platform that standardizes and automates the software delivery lifecycle. Features GitOps workflows, progressive rollouts, and integrated observability.
architecture: GitOps-based architecture using ArgoCD for deployments, Terraform for infrastructure, and a custom Go service for workflow orchestration. Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring.

challenges.title: Zero-Downtime Deployments
challenges.description: Implemented canary deployments with automatic rollback based on error rate thresholds, achieving true zero-downtime releases.

challenges.title: Multi-Environment Management
challenges.description: Built configuration management system handling dev, staging, and production environments with proper secret management.

title: Healthcare Patient Portal
subtitle: HIPAA Compliant Platform
description: A patient portal serving 100K+ users with appointment scheduling, medical records access, and telehealth integration.
overview: A comprehensive patient engagement platform enabling healthcare providers to offer digital services. Includes appointment booking, secure messaging, and video consultations.
architecture: Monolithic backend with React frontend, PostgreSQL with row-level security, and WebRTC for video calls. Implements FHIR standards for healthcare interoperability.

challenges.title: HIPAA Compliance
challenges.description: Implemented comprehensive security controls including encryption, access logging, and automatic session management to meet HIPAA requirements.

challenges.title: EHR Integration
challenges.description: Built FHIR-compliant APIs to integrate with multiple Electronic Health Record systems for seamless data exchange.

results.description: Monthly active patients using the portal

title: Inventory Management System
subtitle: Supply Chain Optimization
description: An AI-powered inventory management system reducing stockouts by 60% through predictive analytics and automated reordering.
overview: An intelligent inventory management platform that uses machine learning to predict demand and optimize stock levels. Integrates with ERP systems and supplier APIs.
architecture: Python backend with TensorFlow for demand forecasting, React dashboard, and PostgreSQL for inventory data. Redis for real-time stock level tracking.

challenges.title: Demand Forecasting
challenges.description: Built ML models considering seasonality, trends, and external factors to predict inventory demand with 92% accuracy.

challenges.title: Real-Time Stock Sync
challenges.description: Implemented real-time synchronization across multiple warehouses and sales channels with conflict resolution.

title: Social Media API Platform
subtitle: Content Management Infrastructure
description: A social media management API handling 1M+ daily posts with content scheduling, analytics, and multi-platform publishing.
overview: A robust API platform enabling businesses to manage their social media presence across multiple platforms. Features scheduled posting, engagement analytics, and content optimization.
architecture: Node.js API with MongoDB for content storage, Bull queues for scheduled posts, and Redis for caching. Connects to Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram APIs.

challenges.title: Rate Limit Management
challenges.description: Built intelligent rate limiting and request queuing system to maximize API utilization while respecting platform limits.

challenges.title: Cross-Platform Publishing
challenges.description: Unified content format with automatic adaptation for each platform's requirements and character limits.

title: E-Learning Platform
subtitle: Educational Technology
description: An interactive e-learning platform with video streaming, progress tracking, and gamification serving 50K+ students.
overview: A comprehensive e-learning platform offering video courses, interactive quizzes, and certification programs. Features adaptive learning paths and progress analytics.
architecture: Next.js frontend with Node.js API, PostgreSQL for user and course data, AWS S3 and CloudFront for video delivery, and Stripe for subscriptions.

challenges.title: Video Streaming at Scale
challenges.description: Implemented adaptive bitrate streaming with CDN delivery ensuring smooth playback for users worldwide.

challenges.title: Gamification Engine
challenges.description: Built a flexible achievement and badge system that increased course completion rates by 45%.

results.description: Net Promoter Score from student surveys

title: Real Estate CRM
subtitle: Property Management Solution
description: A CRM platform for real estate agencies managing 10K+ property listings with lead tracking and automated follow-ups.
overview: A specialized CRM for real estate agencies featuring property listings, lead management, automated communications, and performance analytics for agents.
architecture: React SPA with Node.js API, PostgreSQL for data storage, Redis for caching, and Twilio/SendGrid for automated communications.

challenges.title: Lead Scoring Algorithm
challenges.description: Developed a lead scoring system using engagement data and property preferences to prioritize follow-ups effectively.

challenges.title: Automated Follow-up Sequences
challenges.description: Built a flexible automation engine for multi-channel follow-up sequences with personalization.

results.description: Increase in deals closed per agent
